Paragraph: OFETs based on a benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b 0 ]dithiophene copolymer manufactured on flexible substrate exhibited high hole mobility of 0.5 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 when the source-gate voltage is increased to 60 V.

| source-gate voltage |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

(Note: In this context, "OFETs based on a benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b 0 ]dithiophene copolymer manufactured on flexible substrate" can be considered as the material or system under study, but it is not a property and therefore not included in the table.)

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to the value of a material property. "Source-gate voltage" and "60 V" are input values used to measure the material property.
